The Washington Commanders organization has suspended Rael Enteen, the Vice President of Content after undercover footage showed him calling Black football players “homophobic” and equating fans to “high school alcoholics” and “mouth breathers.”

BREAKING: NFL Commanders VP of Content Labels Black Commanders Players "Homophobic" and NFL Players "Dumb As All Hell," Calls Fans "High School Educated Alcoholics"

title: VP of NFL team calls players "homophobic," admits their social justice is "performative" wokeness

description:
After an incident involving a literal camel bite, 1000-Lb. Sisters' star Amy Slaton Halterman was arrested on drug and child endangerment charges.

It's unclear what triggered the incident with the camel and who may have provoked it but in America, you are innocent until proven guilty and the same probably goes for zoo animals.

"It was no ordinary Labor Day in Crockett County. Deputies were requested to respond to Safari Park where a guest allegedly was bitten by a camel. Upon arrival, deputies were immediately overtaken by suspicious odors coming from the guest’s vehicle," the police department said in a statement.


Star of TLC’s 1000-l
title: Reality show star gets arrested after being bitten by a camel and… wait, what?

One of the common themes among progressives is their incredible ability to project nearly everything wrong with them. Not only are they incapable of holding themselves accountable, but they do the exact opposite and point the finger at the destruction they cause. In this specific instance, “Morning Joe” accused the mainstream media of engaging in “moral relativism” and trying too hard to remain “objective” in the way they cover Trump.

title: Watch: Morning Joe claims the media is pro-Trump. Yes, Morning Joe. Let that sink in.

title: Watch: Apartment complex wrecked by Venezuelan migrants riddled with mold, broken windows, and WORSE

Trump Derangement Syndrome is no joke. In some cases, it's constant—people suffer from it 24/7—and in other cases, it will flare up without warning. That's what happened to the driver in the video you're about to see.

It was a typical afternoon in a city somewhere in America. Trump supporters were on the street minding their own business and showing their appreciation of Donald Trump by waving their Trump flags. One of them may have even had a "HONK if you want to make America great again" sign.

This dude did NOT want to make America great again. He spit on
title: "Tell me you got that!" Driver speeds off after spitting on Trump flag, then something BASED happens

“My dad came out and talked to them. He figured out that I’m getting arrested for a terroristic threat.”

Today is the first day of school in parts of America. Kids have their first-day fits checked. Supplies are packed with a sensible lunch. The kid who got the 152 pack of Crayola crayons is ready to be the Don of the first grade (shout out Tony D'Angelo). And bets are made to see which student will get arrested because their teacher is a nincompoop. If you put money down on Indicas Koonaloak-Young from Colorado, collect your winnings. title: Watch: Public schools are having children arrested for quoting memes now
